instructions: In a saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients.
Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 15-20 minutes or until thickened.
Meanwhile, cut chicken wings into three sections; discard wing tips.
Bake at 375 degrees F for 30 minutes, turning once.
Bake 20-25 minutes longer, turning and basting once, or until chicken juices run clear.
Serve with additional sauce if desired.
title: Zesty Chicken Wings
steps: In a saucepan, combine the first eight ingredients. Bring to a boil. Reduce heat; simmer, uncovered, for 15-20 minutes or until thickened. Meanwhile, cut chicken wings into three sections; discard wing tips. Place wings in a well-greased 15-in. x 10-in. x 1-in. baking pan. Bake at 375 degrees F for 30 minutes, turning once. Brush with sauce. Bake 20-25 minutes longer, turning and basting once, or until chicken juices run clear. Serve with additional sauce if desired.
